name: Houzi
desc: Houzi is a powerful mobile app for real estate agents and companies. It comes with slick design, awesome ui and ux and highly customizable features.

name: Imagitor
desc: Imagitor is a free graphic design app to create social media posts, presentations, posters and other visual content.

name: Studywise
desc: An Artificial Intelligence based mobile application that helps students to studying abroad by providing more than 500 options from 100+ world class universities.

name: Estate-X
desc: Unlock the pinnacle of luxury living with Estate X. United Arab Emirates Real Estate Excellence. Utilizing Blockchain Technology to advance real estate experience.

name: Delifast
desc: Unprecedented delivery experience. With a user-friendly interface, can place orders in a few clicks, track the status of deliveries in real time, and benefit from fluid communication with team.
